message: Cannot combine AUTOINCREMENT and multiple primary keys in SQLite.
details:
[19-May-2025 03:27:58 UTC] WordPress database error
 

MySQL query:

CREATE TABLE wp_cpsp_slides ( id int(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, category_id int(10) NOT NULL, posts_id text, PRIMARY KEY id (id) ) DEFAULT CHARACTER SET utf8mb4

Queries made or created this session were:

  1. Executing: BEGIN | (no parameters)
  2. Executing: ROLLBACK | (no parameters)
